verbose_text: TLR4 / MyD88 and TLR4 / TRIF activated the transcriptional activity of nuclear factor-kappaB (NF-kappaB) and interferon regulating factor 3 (IRF3) respectively, inducing a series of inflammatory factors.
evidence: TRIF activated the transcriptional activity of nuclear factor-kappaB (NF-kappaB) and interferon
